Deities @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Apollyon]{Apollyon}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Cyth-V'sug]{Cyth-V'sug}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Ghlaunder]{Ghlaunder}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Lady Nanbyo]{Lady Nanbyo}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Divine Plagues]{Divine Plagues}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Foul Miasma]{Foul Miasma}

You wield disease and pestilence like a weapon.
name: Plague Domain
